entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls and a thunderstorm. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
